segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, even if it means falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m scared he’s going to hurt himself on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is already wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for him to succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless he’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and he’s still climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish he would just wait until the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to the jar, but it’s not worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is making me so nervous to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
